sentences.english: Even weight-loss surgery doesn't always help people maintain their more svelte physiques.
sentences.chinese: 即使減肥手術也並不能讓人永遠保持苗條的體型。

sentences.english: Players can also fine-tune their characters' clothing, size and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 玩家也能自由調整他們角色的服飾，體型和外表。

sentences.english: Cu Sidhe are huge, dark green fay hounds from the Land of Ever Young.
sentences.chinese: 暗綠色的仙狗們體型巨大，來自常青之地。

sentences.english: Two in three guys now want a shape like a star's.
sentences.chinese: 如今，三分之二的男人想擁有像明星一樣的體型。

sentences.english: These people are called 'Robust' by archaeologists because of their heavy-boned physique.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們粗壯的體型而被考古學者稱爲粗壯型南猿。

sentences.english: Benson attracted attention across Britain for the sheer spectacle of her girth.
sentences.chinese: 本森以她的巨大體型吸引了英國各地的關注。

sentences.english: I think men are threatened by his physicality.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得體型會對一個男人產生威脅。

sentences.english: An ultrasonic distance measuring system with a transmitting-receipting sensor is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種收發同體型超聲測距系統。

sentences.english: Some are designing multiple versions of a garment to fit different body shapes.
sentences.chinese: 有些設計同款服裝的多種尺碼以便適合不同體型。

sentences.english: The lethality of venom depends on a combination of its potency, the volume delivered and the size of the victim.
sentences.chinese: 毒液的殺傷性取決於毒液量和受害者的體型。

sentences.english: Pumas are large, cat-like animal which are found in America.
sentences.chinese: 美洲獅是體型像貓的大動物，產於美洲。

sentences.english: Once and long ago, the human species had a 10-foot high structure.
sentences.chinese: 曾經很久前，人類物種的體型有10英尺高。

sentences.english: Body in general, neither fat nor thin, but his face fleshy.
sentences.chinese: 體型一般，不胖不瘦，只是臉上肉肉的。

sentences.english: The popularity of Chihuahuas was boosted by the fact they could be carried around in handbags.
sentences.chinese: 吉娃娃因其小巧的體型可被裝在手包攜帶，大受歡迎。

sentences.english: She is the fattest sheep, and she often uses her body as a weapon against Big Big Wolf.
sentences.chinese: 她是體型最胖的羊，經常以身體作爲武器對付灰太狼。

sentences.english: The bigger females tend to hang out and rest nearby.
sentences.chinese: 體型稍大的雌魚會在離開巢穴在附近休息。

definition: one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
Fengman district of Jilin city 吉林市, Jilin province
